name: Cyber Tip-Off System
desc: Developed an web-app crime-reporting platform that allows anonymous tips submission to nearest police authorities which helps to mitigate crime rates.

name: College Feedback System
desc: Pioneered a feedback system for college empowering management to seamlessly collect feedback which responses were amplified by 150% within a semester, facilitating resolution of critical issues for faculty.

name: Covid-19 Tracker
desc: Devised website which tracks the impact of COVID-19 in India and across Globe utilizing Open Disease API and implemented various features.

name: FlutterCab
desc: Developed a robust Uber clone app using Flutter, Firebase, etc. Integrated features include Geolocation, Search, Real-time Notifications, and more...

name: SocialFlow
desc: Created a feature-rich clone using Flutter, Authentication, Firestore, etc. Integrated features include push notifications, feeds, and user actions...

name: Todo Pulse
desc: Developed an Task-Tracker tool that monitors and analyzes Employee tasks and todo list

name: JourneyShort
desc: Short Distance analysis application for traveling salesman. Invented 6 optimization algorithms.

name: DataScience AI/ML
desc: Gist of AI/ML practices with various regression and visualization libraries. Used PowerBI to analyze data.

name: DataStore
desc: CRUD operation using React and MongoDb. Also, added authentication support to verify the users.
